pullRequest.title: Drop deprecated aggregator wrapper
pullRequest.bodyText:
This drops the deprecated and now unused asMultiBucketAggregator. It
was too easy to use it to make inefficient Aggregators.
Relates to #56487

commit.message:
Drop deprecated aggregator wrapper

This drops the deprecated and now unused `asMultiBucketAggregator`. It
was too easy to use it to make inefficient `Aggregators`.

Relates to #56487

nodes.bodyText: I already fixed this but somehow didn't remove this! It passed 1000 times for me though.
